page.title: 02H.M.S.DAEDALUS
page.content: H.M.S. DAEDALUS IS A NAVAL ESTABLISHMENT NUMBERING BETWEEN 1500-2000 MEN UNDER THE COMMAND OF A CAPTAIN R.N. IT IS BASED AT LEE-ON-THE-SOLENT AIRFIELD. IT PLAYS THE ROLE OF A FLEET AIR ARM TRAINING ESTABLISHMENT AND HOUSES A SEARCH AND RESCUE HELICOPTER TEAM FLYING WESSEX MARK 5 HELICOPTERS. IT HAS A TECHNICAL EVALUATIONS UNIT, AN ACCIDENT INVESTIGATION UNIT AND A HOVERCRAFT TRIALS UNIT. H.M.S. DAEDALUS HAS AN AIR DAY WHEN MEMBERS OF THE PUBLIC ARE ALLOWED INTO THE ESTABLISHMENT. THE BASE IS THE HOME OF THE PORTSMOUTH NAVAL GLIDING CLUB AND THE FLEET AIR ARM FIELDGUN TEAM WHICH COMPETES AT THE ROYAL TOURNAMENT.
